system.description:
Also at 11th level, you gain one of the options from the 19th-level Extreme Exploration feature. If you already possess the benefit you choose or would gain it again later, you instead gain the following substitutions:

 

Resistance to fire damage - Immunity to fire damage

Resistance to cold damage - Immunity to cold damage

Immunity to poison damage - Immunity to all poisons and the poisoned condition

Climbing speed equal to your Speed - +10 to climbing speed

Swimming speed equal to your Speed - +10 to swimming speed
